cause.description:
Current projects in Belize, Haiti, Zimbabwe, Tanzania, and several restricted access countries.
1. We provide clean water through the repair and installation of water pumps.
2. We respond to disasters and war with water treatment and various relief supplies
3. We strive to be a living expression of the love of Christ by meeting great human needs.
4. We get more done with less by mobilizing volunteers into our projects.
cause.mission: Transforming Communities Through The Power of Compassion
cause.name: Thirst No More
